name: Brain Brawls
description:
Welcome to Brain Brawls

Use your memory, speed and skill to defeat the opposition and claim the title of worlds best brain.

Beat your opponent, be the first to memorise all the images. Buzz in to gain control of the board. There's no room for error, peak to soon and your opponent can steal the victory.

Is your brain better than everybody's?

Features:
- Test your memory against players from across the world
- Three difficulties to suit all players
- Earn coins from playing matches, go on a win streak to earn even more.
- Use powerups to give yourself an edge.
